resources.string: Hello \"username\"! Here are some recommended activities. Be sure to let us know if there are any changes to your health status.
Ways to Protect Yourself and Others

Clean your hands often using soap and water, or alcohol.
Maintain a safe distance from anyone who is coughing or sneezing.
Wear a mask when physical distancing is not possible.
Donâ€™t touch your eyes, nose or mouth.
Cover your nose and mouth with your bent elbow or a tissue when you cough or sneeze.
Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have a fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention
Ways to Care for Your Mental Health

Take a break from the news and social media - these can stress you out.
Take care of your body, whether that be exercising or eating well.
Get plenty of sleep. Avoid excessive alcohol, tobacco, and substance use.
Make time to unwind. Try to do some other activities you enjoy.
Connect with others by phone, video calls, and other means.
To register, enter a username and password that you will remember. You will create a unique profile which is saved under your username.
Please answer the following questions to determine your risk for COVID-19. If none of the responses corresponds to your situation, choose the most appropriate response
Please select the option that best describes your exercise habits
Please enter any medical conditions you have been diagnosed with and select the appropriate choice
